course.title: Tutorial - Senior Year
course.faculty_text: Jane Leber Herr and members of the Department
course.description: For students writing a senior thesis out of sequence.
course.notes: Students who are writing a senior thesis out of sequence (i.e., beginning in the spring) must enroll in Economics 990 in the spring and complete the course in the fall. Students must write a 25-page paper at the end of the first term of Economics 990. Students currently enrolled in Economics 985 may not enroll in Economics 990.
